GUIDES_INTRO:
Welcome to the Ultimate ChatGPT Experience üöÄ

ChatGPT Toolbox ‚Äî your all-in-one productivity upgrade for smarter, faster, and more organized conversations.
Here‚Äôs your quick guide to every powerful feature. Click the links below each section for full walkthroughs.
GUIDES_PROMPT_CHAINING:
‚ú® <{{strong}}>Prompt Chaining</{{strong}}>
Queue up to 10 prompts and run them step-by-step ‚Äî with placeholders, drag-and-drop reordering, and adaptive responses that wait for the previous step to finish. Perfect for complex workflows. Just type `..` to see your chain list.
GUIDES_DYNAMIC_PROMPTS:
‚ö°Ô∏è <{{strong}}>Dynamic Prompts</{{strong}}>
Save reusable prompts with variables like {{name}} or {{date}}, and fill them instantly with `//` in ChatGPT. Ideal for templates and repetitive tasks. Just type `//` to see your prompt list.
GUIDES_MESSAGE_BOOKMARKING:
üîñ <{{strong}}>Message Bookmarking</{{strong}}>
Mark important messages in any chat, then search and revisit them anytime ‚Äî no more endless scrolling.
GUIDES_PROMPT_LIBRARY:
üìö <{{strong}}>Prompt Library</{{strong}}>
Access hundreds of expertly crafted prompts across marketing, sales, SEO, customer service, personal growth, and more.
GUIDES_FOLDERS_SUBFOLDERS:
üóÇÔ∏è <{{strong}}>Folders & Subfolders</{{strong}}>
Organize chats and GPTs into unlimited folders and subfolders ‚Äî perfect for client work, research, and ongoing projects.
GUIDES_PIN_CHATS:
üìå <{{strong}}>Pin Chats</{{strong}}>
Keep your key conversations at the top for quick, easy access.
GUIDES_PIN_FOLDERS:
üìå <{{strong}}>Pin Folders</{{strong}}>
Keep your essential folders and subfolders at the top for quick, easy access.
GUIDES_GROUP_GPTS_TOGETHER:
üéØ <{{strong}}>Group GPTs Together</{{strong}}>
Keep all your GPTs neatly organized in one place ‚Äî ready to expand or collapse anytime.
GUIDES_IMAGE_GALLERY:
üñºÔ∏è <{{strong}}>Image Gallery</{{strong}}>
Browse, search, and download every image ChatGPT generates ‚Äî all in one place.
GUIDES_SINGLE_CHAT_EXPORT:
üì§ <{{strong}}>Single-Chat Export</{{strong}}>
Export chat as TXT or JSON for sharing, archiving, or backups.
GUIDES_BULK_CHAT_EXPORT:
üì§ <{{strong}}>Bulk Chat Export</{{strong}}>
Export multiple chats as TXT or JSON for sharing, archiving, or backups.
GUIDES_BULK_DELETE_ARCHIVE:
üóëÔ∏è <{{strong}}>Bulk Delete & Archive</{{strong}}>
Clean up old or unused chats in seconds ‚Äî no more deleting one by one.
GUIDES_DOWNLOAD_AS_MP3:
üéß <{{strong}}>Download as MP3</{{strong}}>
Convert ChatGPT responses into high-quality audio files for listening on the go, with 9 voices to choose from.
GUIDES_ADVANCED_SEARCH:
üîé <{{strong}}>Advanced Search</{{strong}}>
Find any message, prompt, or thread in seconds.
GUIDES_MULTI_LANGUAGE_RTL_SUPPORT:
üåê <{{strong}}>Multi-Language & RTL Support</{{strong}}>
Work seamlessly in multiple languages with flawless right-to-left rendering for Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, and more.
